# Pull Request

**Please select the appropriate template for your contribution:**

- **Feature Implementation:** [Click here to use the Feature Template](?template=feature.md)
- **Bug Fix:** [Click here to use the Bugfix Template](?template=bugfix.md)
- **Cleanup / Refactor:** [Click here to use the Cleanup Template](?template=cleanup.md)

---
*If you are unable to click the links above, please copy the relevant sections from `.github/PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE/` manually.*
